title: C.D.C. Links Deadly Listeria Outbreak to Deli Meats and Cheeses
description: Sixteen people in six states have been infected with the listeria strain, resulting in one death and 13 hospitalizations, the agency said.
dc:creator: Eduardo Medina
category: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
media:description: An electron microscope image of the Listeria monocytogenes bacterium, responsible for the food-borne illness listeriosis.
